Chen is now a third year PhD student in Department of Computer Science, UCL. His research interests cover Inverse Problems, an area in Mathematics solving for hidden variables given observations & forward models explaining the observations with hidden variables, Bayesian Inference, an area in Statistics modelling data with likelihood functions & prior information as well as exploring the posterior distributions by sophisticated approximations, and Machine Learning which connects solid mathematical and statistical analysis to exciting real world problems.
